# Centraal Beheer 
![Logo](data:image/png;base64,)

Centraal Beheer, headquartered in Apeldoorn, the Netherlands, is a leading insurance company established in 1909 and a subsidiary of Achmea. It is well-regarded for its comprehensive range of insurance products, including car, home, travel, and health insurance, as well as tailored business insurance solutions. The company's memorable marketing campaign with the slogan "Even Apeldoorn bellen" ("Just call Apeldoorn") underscores its commitment to providing accessible and reliable customer service, enhancing its reputation in the Dutch market.

In addition to its core insurance offerings, Centraal Beheer provides investment services, pension plans, and other financial products for individuals and businesses. The company is known for its innovative use of digital technologies to improve customer experience and personalized services. Furthermore, Centraal Beheer emphasizes corporate social responsibility and sustainable practices, engaging in initiatives that promote environmental sustainability and community development, solidifying its position as a trusted and forward-thinking leader in the insurance industry.

# How to get the files

 1. Log into your Centraal Beheer account.
 1. Navigate to the "Beleggingsopdracht" section.
   ![Step1](./Images/CentraalBeheer_1.png)
 1. Click on the "Bekijken" link.
   ![Step2](./Images/CentraalBeheer_2.png)
 1. Click on the "Afgeronde opdrachten".
   ![Step3](./Images/CentraalBeheer_3.png)
 1. Select the desired filters and the date range for the transactions.
   ![Step4](./Images/CentraalBeheer_4.png)
 1. Click on the "Download het rekeningsoverzicht" button to start the print.
 1. Print to PDF without headers and footers.

## Example of content of the files

See test files in the repository.

No known limitations so far.
